App Developer for Startups

Bill Vivino Technology partners with startups to design and develop custom mobile apps. Whether you’re building your MVP or scaling to your first 10,000 users, we deliver high-quality iOS, Android, and cross-platform solutions. We work with founders in North Jersey, the NYC metro area, and across the U.S.

Why Choose Bill Vivino Technology

Leading a team of experienced engineers, we specialize in helping startups build secure, scalable apps that bring bold ideas to life—from MVP to product-market fit and beyond.

Core Development Services

  • iOS & SwiftUI app development
  • Android & Kotlin app development
  • React Native cross-platform/hybrid apps
  • Backend APIs & Firebase/Node.js
  • AR/VR & Unity-based experiences
  • AI & Machine Learning integrations
